biotools.summary: FATCAT provides the means to compare two PDB-format protein structures, or to search for structures similar to a given PDB structure.  The user can supply a PDB ID or upload a structure file.  The FATCAT web server employs the Flexible structure AlignmenT by Chaining AFPs (Aligned Fragment Pairs) with Twists (FATCAT) algorithm.

bioschemas.name: FATCAT
